children.desc: Grants access to a server shell that has a very high capacity for components.

children.name: List Circuitry
children.desc: Configures new integrated circuit components capable of representing one dimensional data structures such as arrays, stacks, and queues.

children.name: Cyborg Construction
children.desc: Sapient robots with preloaded tool modules and programmable laws.

children.name: Man Machine Interface
children.desc: A slightly Frankensteinian device that allows human brains to interface natively with software APIs.

children.desc: NT default research technologies

children.desc: NT default research technologies

children.name: Advanced Biotechnology
children.desc: Advanced Biotechnology

children.desc: We have the technology to rebuild him.

children.desc: We have the technology to upgrade him.

children.name: IPC Parts
children.desc: We have the technology to replace him.

children.desc: Upgraded and more powerful cybernetic implants.

children.desc: When simple medicine doesn't cut it.

children.desc: When evolution isn't fast enough

children.desc: We have the technology to make him.

children.desc: Smart freezing of objects to preserve them!

children.desc: Electronic implants buried beneath the skin.

children.desc: Big Data, in space!

children.desc: Computers and how they work.

children.name: Computer Hardware
children.desc: How computer hardware are made.

children.desc: Subspace transmission technology for near-instant communications devices.

children.name: Computerized Recordkeeping
children.desc: Organized record databases and how they're used.

children.desc: The usefulness of computerized records, projected straight onto your eyepiece!

children.name: Night Vision Technology
children.desc: Allows seeing in the dark without actual light!

children.name: Neural Programming
children.desc: Study into networks of processing units that mimic our brains.

children.name: Positronic Brain
children.desc: Applied usage of neural technology allowing for autonomous AI units based on special metallic cubes with conductive and processing circuits.

children.name: Basic Nanite Programming
children.desc: The basics of nanite construction and programming.

children.name: Smart Nanite Programming
children.desc: Nanite programs that require nanites to perform complex actions, act independently, roam or seek targets.

children.name: Mesh Nanite Programming
children.desc: Nanite programs that require static structures and membranes.

children.name: Biological Nanite Programming
children.desc: Nanite programs that require complex biological interaction.

children.name: Harmonic Nanite Programming
children.desc: Nanite programs that require seamless integration between nanites and biology.

children.name: Military Nanite Programming
children.desc: Nanite programs that perform military-grade functions.

children.name: Hazard Nanite Programs
children.desc: Extremely advanced Nanite programs with the potential of being extremely dangerous.

children.name: Neural Nanite Programming
children.desc: Nanite programs affecting nerves and brain matter.

children.name: Synaptic Nanite Programming
children.desc: Nanite programs affecting mind and thoughts.

children.name: Basic Security Equipment
children.desc: Standard equipment used by security.

children.name: Nonlethal Landmine Technology
children.desc: Our weapons technicians could perhaps work out methods for the creation of nonlethal landmines for security teams.

children.desc: Using IFF technology, we could develop smartmines that do not trigger for those who are mindshielded.

children.name: Advanced Landmine Technology
children.desc: We can further develop our smartmines to build some extremely capable designs.

children.name: Advanced Power Manipulation
children.desc: How to get more zap.

children.desc: Finely-tooled manufacturing techniques allowing for picometer-perfect precision levels.

children.desc: Our researchers have found new ways to weaponize just about everything now.

children.desc: Weapons using medical technology.

children.desc: Various advanced beam weapons

children.desc: Using bluespace to make things faster and better.

children.desc: Application of Bluespace for static teleportation technology.

children.desc: Research the technology required to create and use basic shuttles.

children.desc: Research into voidspace tunnelling, allowing us to significantly reduce flight times.

children.desc: Unlock the potential of the mysterious anomalies that appear on station.

children.name: Miniaturized Bluespace Research
children.desc: Extreme reduction in space required for bluespace engines, leading to portable bluespace technology.

children.desc: Portable bluespace technology allows the production of backpacks that can store a greater volume of items than the volume of the bag.

children.name: Bluespace Wormhole Projector
children.desc: Develop the research required to create a miniaturized bluespace wormhole projector, allowing you to jump between two places instantly.

children.name: Quantum Spin Inverter
children.desc: Research the ability to create an experimental device that is able to swap the locations of two entities by switching their particles' spin values. Must be linked to another device to function.

children.desc: Even more powerful.. power!

children.desc: Honk?!
